local_intent: Compute a pinch grasp for the grape and verify the grasp pose is available, retrying if needed.
assumptions: Grape target is already localized enough for grasp computation
coherence_with_global: Matches global sequence: ComputeGraspPose(target=grape, strategy=pinch, result_key=grasp_grape) followed by PoseAvailable, with retry to recover when the pose is initially unavailable.
